replies.body:
It seems that you're having a network problem that's failing to connect to our servers.  As suggest in a previous post, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would be your best bet towards getting this resolved.  It would also be good to test out these fixes in custom games to prevent penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
